A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As someone that loves Star Wars as a whole I was quite shocked with how boring and slow this movie was. There was about 5-6 different \"fake out endings\" with redundant scenes and wasted potential. This is the last nail in the coffin for me to give up on any upcoming Star Wars films. If I wanted to watch Star Wars Episode 5 I'd go watch it not watch some bad remake
